CatDescriptText: Mrs. Margaret Coghill, Esplen, Pa., was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 21, 1958, pg.5 with question: "Do you think that the city needs a fair housing ordinance?" answer reads: �I think that it�s good, because you have to live the same as I do.�
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Margaret Coghill, wearing patterned short sleeve dress, holding light colored handbag over left arm, standing in front of York Shop, Fifth Avenue, Downtown
